section_title: PANEL DISCUSSION ON BEST PRACTICES IN POLICIES AND MEASURES
sentences: On Thursday, 13 April, participants met in plenary to hear panel presentations and discuss issues raised at this workshop.
Panelists included representatives from Nigeria, Portugal, Australia, Poland, Tuvalu, the Netherlands, Japan, Brazil and France.
enb_long_title: UNFCCC WORKSHOP ON BEST PRACTICES IN POLICIES AND MEASURES
